roleset.name: convert into ions
roleset.note: IONIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ionize' based on internet usage examples, expansion via VN. VerbNet entry 45.4, comparison with 'sterilize.' (from ionize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: With cause, hydrogen
example.text: Most of the hydrogen gas is not ionized because O and B stars are rare
example.arg: because O and B stars are rare
